text:
Celebs The Cutest Celebrity Couples and Best Friend Duos on the Oscars 2017 Red Carpet 
One of the most exciting parts about the Oscars is seeing which celebrity couples and best friend duos walk the red carpet. And this year's ceremony didn't disappoint! There were so many amazing pairs on tonight's Oscars 2017 carpet—from married Hollywood icons to BFFs and even a few family dates. (Lin-Manuel Miranda and his mother should definitely get an award for cutest red carpet pairing.) Flip through the gallery to check out our favorite duos from the Oscars 2017 red carpet. Academy Awards 2017 came to slay! By Christopher Rosa Best friends Michelle Williams and Busy Philipps Getty Images Actor John Cho and his wife, Kerri Higuchi Getty Images Pharrell Williams and his creative director, Mimi Valdes Getty Images Actor Samuel L. Jackson and his wife, LaTanya Richardson Jackson Getty Images Friends Aldis Hodge and Glen Powell Getty Images Chrissy Teigen and her husband, musician John Legend Getty Images Dev Patel and his mother, Anita Patel Frazer Harrison Actress Ginnifer Goodwin and her husband, actor Josh Dallas Getty Images Actor Viggo Mortensen and his son, Henry Mortensen Getty Images Friends Jackie Chan and Riz Ahmed Getty Images Actress Jessica Biel and her husband, singer Justin Timberlake Getty Images Actress Leslie Mann and her husband, producer Judd Apatow Getty Images Lin-Manuel Miranda and his mother, Luz Towns-Miranda Getty Images Actor Michael J. Fox and his wife, Tracy Pollan Getty Images Actor Terrence Howard and his partner, Mira Pak Getty Images Actress Trudie Styler and her husband, musician Sting Getty Images Friends and TV personalities Louise Roe and Stacy London Getty Images Actor Denzel Washington and his wife, Pauletta Washington Getty Images Actor Jamie Dornan and his wife, actress Amelia Warner Getty Images Actor Seth Rogen and his wife, actress Lauren Miller Getty Images Actress Brie Larson and her fiancé, musician Alex Greenwald Getty Images Dwayne Johnson and his partner, Lauren Hashian Frazer Harrison Actor Jason Bateman and his wife, Amanda Anka Getty Images Matt Damon and his wife, Luciana Barroso Getty Images Actor Chris Evans and his sister, Shanna Evans Getty Images Actor Jeff Bridges and his wife, Susan Geston Getty Images Best friends Michelle Williams and Busy Philipps Getty Images
